name: Speed Warrior Trick or Treat
description:
Speed Warrior : Trick or Treat Edition is a 2D top down shooter with Halloween theme. You driving a car, killing some pumpkin head creature, they will drop a candy and you need to collect it to give it to the kid.

Like the game and have any suggestion? please leave a comment.

Instructions

1. D to shoot
2. Up to gas
3. Down to brake
4. Left/Right to Steer
